participant_1.background:
I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.
i like things that explode.
When I want a sweet treat, I enjoy a pear.
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.
I love finding little things in the woods to add to my collection.

participant_2.background:
I'm always building models of sports cars, so I guess racing is my favorite sport.
I went to Sicily to visit the real-life locations of The Godfather.
I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews.
i will graduate from college in two years.
I'm passionate about my career and I want to be the best I can be.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Hi, not much. Just got back from a soccer game with my nieces and nephews.
That sounds fun! Do you like to play soccer?
I do! I'm not very good, but it's a lot of fun.
I like to play soccer too, but I'm not very good either.
That's okay, we can practice together!
That sounds like a plan!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks in the woods, and I like to play with my train set.
That sounds really relaxing. I've never been to the woods before, but I've always wanted to go.
You should go! It's really beautiful.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome!
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to build models of sports cars, and I like to collect little things from the woods.
That's really cool! I've never been into building models, but I think it's really cool.
Thanks! I've been building models for a long time, and I really enjoy it.
That's awesome! I'm glad you have a hobby that you enjoy.
Thanks! I am too.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good night!
You too!
